mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where wishlist_member_no= #{member_no} and wishlist_hosting_no=#{hosting_no}
mapper.select: select h.*, mr.member_image, mr.member_name, mr.member_host_state, round((select avg(r.review_star) from review r where r.review_hosting_no = h.hosting_no),1) avg, (select count(*) from review r where r.review_hosting_no = h.hosting_no) ctn from hosting h inner join (select * from member m inner join (select * from wishlist w where w.wishlist_member_no = #{memberNo}) wr on m.member_no = wr.wishlist_member_no) mr on h.hosting_no = mr.wishlist_hosting_no
select * from wishlist where wishlist_member_no=#{wishlistMemberNo} and wishlist_hosting_no=#{wishlistHostingNo}
